title: The height shall be restricted to permissible top elevation as mentioned on Colour Coded Zoning Maps(CCZM) prepared by the Airport Authority of India (AAI) published onits web site
clause_text: The height shall be restricted to permissible top elevation as mentioned on Colour Coded Zoning Maps(CCZM) prepared by the Airport Authority of India (AAI) published onits web site. For any additional height beyond that mentioned in a) above,prior NOC from AAI shall be submitted. For the areas depicted in red colour on CCZM prior NOC from AAI shall be submitted. The height permitted by CCZM is indicated Above Mean Sea Level i.e AMSL
section: Height restrictions in the vicinity of aerodromes

source_pdf.text_snippet: The height shall be restricted to permissible top elevation as mentioned on Colour Coded Zoning Maps(CCZM) prepared by the Airport Authority of India (AAI) published onits web site.
